title: Teacher Rachel DelTondo dead in driveway; bought $10,000 wedding dress then groom cancels wedding
itunes:title: Teacher Rachel DelTondo dead in driveway; bought $10,000 wedding dress then groom cancels wedding
description:
A beautiful young teacher who had been accused of an inappropriate relationship with a teen was gunned down in her mother’s driveway. The mystery of who murdered Rachel DelTondo is the subject of this Crime Stories episode. Nancy Grace is joined by Atlanta juvenile judge & lawyer Ashley Willcott, forensics expert Karen Smith, Los Angeles psycho analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall, and CrimeOnline contributing reporter Jennifer Dzikowski.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
